pageTitle: Royal Blast Glove > Sale | Jenson USA
title: Size Chart
textBeforeTable: Blast by name - Blast by nature - this glove is racked with performance features. Check out the palm - no unnecessary padding - just .8mm perforated Clarino with embossed Silicon fingertips and roll-over fingertip detail. The back of the hand features 3D primo mesh for maximum flexibility and comfort. A microfiber thumb-wipe is a great added touch, as are the direct-inject logos which provide great flexibility without compromising comfort. A TPR wrist closure and low profile hook and loop closure complete the profile. Sold as a pair, includes left and right glove. Royal Blast Glove Shipping Store Availability Reviews Description    Out of stock.
